title: KIK BOT / KIK BOT AUTO RESPONDER
desc: WHAT IM REALLY LOOKING FOR IS A KIK MESSAGER APP BOT AND HOW IT WORKS AS BELOWTHIS BOT MUST RUN IN WINDOWS PCTHIS BOT MUST ONLY NEED USERNAME : PASSWORD FOR THE ACCOUNTS TO RUNMUST BE MULTI THREADING I.E. I CAN RUN SIMULTANEOUS ACCOUNT THAT AUTO RESPONDS TO MESSAGESEVERYTIME SOMEONE MESSAGE THE ACCOUNTSAUTO RESPONDS EVERYTIME SOMEONE SENDS A MESSAGE TO THE ACCOUNT WITH FORMATTHAT I CAN SET I.E. BELOWFor example:Stranger: Hi! What's your name?BOT Autoresponder: Hello, my name is.../2 seconds delay between messagesBOT Autoresponder: Monica, how are you?STRANGE: IM GOODBOT AUTO RESPONDER: OK SO THIS IS ME "SENDS AN IMAGE/VIDEO"CONCLUSION: IF AUTO RESPONDER ACCOUNT GETS A NEW FIRST NEW MESSAGE FROM A PERSON > IT AUTO STARTS TO RESPOND-Set messages to autorespond) - 1 line, 1 message < Spintax support < Add image from the root folder, addvideo from root support (Kik has a function to upload image/video/etc from mobile to chat)-Set delays (in seconds) between autoresponds/messages (1 message - 1 delay function (in seconds)) Forexample: message 1 > 2 seconds waiting time > message 2 > 5 seconds waiting time)-Multithreaded < to send messages for many people at the same time from the [url removed, login to view] list.-Bulk accounts support. For example: I load 30 Kik usernames (username:pass) and set 20 threads < so 20accounts will log on a different proxy and start sending messages. 20acc x threads=20 messages sent at time.-Username list to send messages for (a .txt file where the usernames appear in a row or separated in comas,so bot accounts will start taking the scraped usernames from the list and keep sending them new messages for them)In conclusion: Messenger accounts, keeps taking usernames from the list and keeps sending messages for them. Multithreaded is needed for sending messages for multiple people with spintax and proxies support at the same time.

with a limit of only 500 USD a day with properly registered identity of passport and other identity of bank account from home country or the country he is working.5) Registered people without bank accounts will be able to transfer only 50 USD per day to other countries from his available wallet.6) Users without KYC will be able to receive or send only 50 USD per day from him available wallet.7) Every user with proper registered bank and identity is eligible to receive 1.5% interest per month on his available balance in wallet.8) Referring proper registered user will be eligible to receive 2.5% interest per month on his available balance in wallet (I will change this option in future).9) Every transaction should be secured10) Must have option to use this wallet to buy anything or pay for anything while shopping at any store or online or using taxi11) Must have shopping option within app like flipkart, aliexpress, ola, uber, railway tickets, hotels, (this option is not important)12) Must have chatting option, make friends, multiple video calling, multiple voice calling, group chat, group calling, share everyday moments with likes and comments all same as in wechat,13) Share files, videos, pictures all same as in wechat14) web based login as in wechat and whatsapp15) Desktop version of the app to login only with QR code and no other options should be provided16) Option to have Multi vendor e-commerce for proper registered users just like paytm have both options17) Should have stickers sending option as in wechat and hike app.18) Organs, Blood, food and clothes donars to few genuine foundation which I recommend.19) All donars should receive digital identity card generated online instantly with QR code on it after filling all the information and acceptancelet me know the approximate time and budget for it and what are other requirements to process further. title: Mobile development
desc: I need a mobile site.  I would like it designed and built.  Hello,I saw your ad on craigslist [url removed, login to view] and I was interested in possibly trading some web design for cash.  I am looking to have mobile friendly webpage created.  The concept is to send opt in customers with a url to this page where they will have the opportunity to review the store on one of a couple of Websites (Google, Yelp, Facebook)If the customer clicks on 1, 2, 3 Stars they will be routed to either a popup or secondary page soliciting their feedback on how we can improve.  I would love to use my existing form generation software to handle this if possible so that I have complete freedom over the contents of the form and can easily make changes as needed.  If it would be easier to create it in an integrated fashion I am open to that as well (it will just have to be able to send off an email to a predefined address).Links to possible css scripts for the rating system:[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]When you click 4 or 5 stars you are presented with a different page encouraging you to review us on one of the above services (plus any you may feel would be helpful in increasing Local SEO optimization)This page would have hyperlinks directly to the individual rating page for the store.Inline image 6Lastly if it wouldn't be too much trouble a management page in which I could control the links would be an incredible addition as I have a couple of locations I would like to use this at if it tests well for me.  If the cost would be significant to create it at salable I can do without.If this is something you would be interested in working on please give me a call or send me an email to provide an estimate for the project.
